page.title: 02RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES.
page.content: One hundred children were asked their favourite leisure activity. The three most popular were football 25%, swimming 20% and watching television 8%. 74% played some kind of sport. Boys listed playing football, watching television, playing with friends, going on day trips, reading, listening to music and walking as their favourite activities. Girls listed playing with their friends, visiting people and watching television. One hundred adults were asked their favourite leisure activities. The three most popular were walking, swimming and reading. Other activities mentioned were shooting, going for a drink, keep fit, weight training and visiting relatives. 25% of those asked went abroad for their holidays, the favourite destination being Spain.
